name: Evolution Saved Me
description:
DESCRIPTION
Dodge the lightings, eat bananas, evolve with the fire, survive!

CONTROLS
- "a, s, d, f" or arrow keys for movement.

CREDITS
This is a project made by students for the joy and knowledge about making better games.
- Artist & Designer: Antonio Bastos Córdoba. (@antonio10bc)
- Programmer: Diego C. Torguet. (@DiegoCTorguet)
- Arrangements: Manuel Rodríguez Matesanz. (@Manuxd789)

We used:
"Cyborg Ninja", "Home Base Groove", "Overworld"
Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
